description:
Do you like color matching games? Gem Hunt is a new fresh take on this genre. Score points by matching two gems of the same type. Each gem type gives you a different amount of points. Can you beat your friends' or family members' highscore? Email us at intouch@2drockers.com with any feedback or suggestions. If you enjoy this game, please post a review in the app catalog. Thanks! 
-- More updates coming soon -- Support us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/2D-Rockers/155722724445797 -- Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/2DRockers
